title: Sonny Boy Williamson II - 9 Albums (FLAC)
description:
Sonny Boy Williamson II is one of my all time favs...that man lived a lifetime that allowed him to play with Robert Johnson up to adoring fans Eric Clapton, Jimmy Page, Eric Burdon and others.

Along the way he recorded singles with guitarists such as Muddy Waters, Elmore james, Robert Jr. Lockwood, Matt Murphy, Buddy Guy....and pianists like Willie Love, Memphis Slim and Otis Spann and on and on..

If these were vinyl albums I would have worn out the grooves ages ago but these are CD remasters and reissues that I ripped to FLAC and uploaded here hoping there are some people out there that can appreciate or come to appreciate Sonny Boy II as much as I.


Albums:
1. Clownin' with the World (with Willie Love)
2. Goin' in Your Direction
3. Down and Out Blues
4. Keep It To Ourselves
5. King Buscuit Time
6. The Real Folk Blues
7. More Real Folk Blues
8. Bummer Road
9. One Way Out


All albums are neatly tagged and embedded with front album covers.


Please seed for a while :-)
